name: Ms Sibongile Mokoraki
profile: With more than a decade experience as a Professional Nurse working with all the members of the health care team, I believe that a multi-disciplinary approach to patient care is the best way to provide comprehensive health care to the patients </br>My work experience in the pharmaceutical industry, as a Professional nurse and clinical training specialist has contributed my understanding of the value chain needed deliver quality health care for the patients.
verse: 3 John 1:2 I believe that good health in body and soul prolongs the patientâ€™s quality of life.
